learning_science.title: Visible Learning for Teachers
learning_science.key_finding: Student self-reporting of grades has one of the highest effect sizes (1.44) on learning achievement.
learning_science.application: Directly impacts the accuracy of self-perception mapping.

learning_science.title: Grit: The Power of Passion and Perseverance
learning_science.key_finding: High levels of grit are 2x more predictive of graduation rates than IQ alone.
learning_science.application: Used to calculate setback recovery and persistence metrics.

learning_science.title: The Science of Learning: 77 Findings That Every Teacher Should Know
learning_science.key_finding: Retrieval practice is the most effective way to transfer information from short-term to long-term memory.
learning_science.application: Basis for daily retrieval protocols in our Action Plan.

learning_science.title: Atomic Habits
learning_science.key_finding: Habit stacking and environment design are the most efficient ways to lower cognitive friction.
